_meta.description: Canonical execution request fixture for determinism verification
_meta.note: The result_digest below is the expected BLAKE3 hex for this exact request on the canonical platform. Regenerate with scripts/generate_golden_corpus.sh after any engine change.

expected.note: result_digest must be identical across all re-executions with the same inputs. The exact value depends on the compiled engine version; pin it after first run.
